label: Postal and Packaging Supplies
description: Supplies for mailing and packaging items, including envelopes, tubes, and bags.
intents: Send gifts to friends and family

subcategories.label: Bubble Wrap and Padded Envelopes
subcategories.description: Envelopes and bags with added padding or bubble wrap for extra protection.

subcategories.label: Cardboard Tubes
subcategories.description: Sturdy tubes made of cardboard for shipping and storage.

subcategories.label: Polythene Bags
subcategories.description: Lightweight bags made of polythene for shipping and storage.

subcategories.label: Cylinder Tubes and Containers
subcategories.description: Tubes and containers in the shape of a cylinder for storage and shipping.

subcategories.label: Mailing Envelopes
subcategories.description: Envelopes for mailing documents and small items.
